duties_responsibilities.duty: Support Vice Presidents by scheduling meetings, calendar management, arranging travel, creating, and submitting expense reports along with email support.
Support Executive Directors by arranging travel, creating, and submitting expense reports, scheduling of internal and external meetings.
Coordinate materials needed in the field for trainings and work with the trainer on the details.
Work with the Meeting Coordinator to ensure all program/client meetings are properly scheduled in advance and are successful, which may include setup and clean up of meetings.
Assist the Executive Assistant, Event Planner and Meeting Coordinator with special projects.
Assist in making travel arrangements for new hires.
Greets visitors and directs them to the appropriate area.
Responsible for creating welcome screens and presenting them on monitors for the client visits.
Serve as back-up receptionist as needed.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (GED) required
1-3 years prior experience with meeting coordination or administrative experience
